name: Beyblade Battle - An AR Game
description:
BeyBlade Battle uses AR to give you the ultimate beyblade experience. You can choose from 4 different beyblades and can have an ultimate match.

Try BeyBlade Battle right now – we’d love to hear your feedback!

Note:
Please note that BeyBlade Battle requires ARCore library produced by Google. ARCore is constantly improving, which, in turn, positively affects the quality of BeyBlade Battle.
